thread.section_title: PaintYourLife.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PaintYourLife.com | www.paintyourlife.com
thread.title: Cynthia Blaylock

author: Cynthia Blaylock
title: Cynthia Blaylock
text: I had a landscape photo oil painted in very large format (60" x 46") and it turned out very nice. The price and service were outstanding - PaintYourLife kept me advised throughout the process of the status of my painting. Because it was too large for them to frame I am currently having it stretched and framed by a local framer - I can't wait to get it and hang it on the wall!
